text: وَإِن يَكَادُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَيُزۡلِقُونَكَ بِأَبۡصَٰرِهِمۡ لَمَّا سَمِعُواْ ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُۥ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

translation.en: And indeed, those who disbelieve would almost make you slip with their eyes when they hear the message, and they say, "Indeed, he is mad
translation.id: Dan sungguh, orang-orang kafir itu hampir-hampir menggelincirkanmu dengan pandangan mata mereka, ketika mereka mendengar Alquran dan mereka berkata, "Dia (Muhammad) itu benar-benar orang gila
